headline: Assessing General Electric’s Valuation After a Recent Pullback and Powerful Multi‑Year Share Price Run
summary: General Electric (GE) has had an impressive run this year, but after a recent pullback investors are asking whether the stock still offers upside or if expectations have simply run ahead of reality. See our latest analysis for General Electric. After a powerful run driven by optimism around GE Aerospace’s engine demand and margin improvements, the recent pullback and 1 month share price return of minus 8.54% look more like cooling momentum than a broken story. This is particularly the case...

headline: GE Vernova Soars After AI Spurs Higher Dividend and Buybacks
summary: Shares of the supplier of electric-generation equipment climbed 16% to $723.09 at 9:38 a.m. in New York, a day after it doubled its dividend, increased the scope for share buybacks and raised earnings projections at an investor day in New York.  GE Vernova has benefited from soaring US demand for electricity, driven by data centers, artificial intelligence and overall electrification of the economy.  “AI is a real driver for us right now, but it isn’t the only driver,” Chief Executive Officer Scott Strazik said in an interview Tuesday.

headline: GE Vernova Stock Surges on Big Guidance Raise, Doubling of Dividend, and Increased Stock Buyback Authorization
summary: Shares of the energy giant, which is involved in supplying equipment needed for AI-driven electric grid upgrades, rose 5.9% in Tuesday's after-hours trading, which should bode well for its price performance on Wednesday.
